Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network.socket

Class SocketClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network.socket.SocketClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardListener, ChatListener, GameFieldListener, GameListener, PlayerListener, VirtualView, Remote
public class SocketClientHandler extends Object implements VirtualView
Class that manages the whole communication with a specific client.
